headline: Equifax Launches Identity Proofing Solution in Award-Winning Kount® 360 Platform
summary: Equifax® (NYSE: EFX) is launching Identity Proofing in its award-winning Kount® 360 identity and payments fraud platform. Powered by the Equifax Cloud™, Identity Proofing is tailored to help businesses who are reliant on identity verification, including financial institutions, automotive lenders, retailers with online transactions, and more to integrate verification checks throughout the customer journey by ensuring the information provided is real, affiliated with the person, can be trusted, an

headline: Why Equifax (EFX) Shares Are Trading Lower Today
summary: Shares of credit reporting giant Equifax (NYSE:EFX) fell 4% in the afternoon session after the major indices continued to retreat (Nasdaq -1.5%, S&P 500 -1.2%) amid profit-taking and renewed concerns about tariffs. Investors reacted to a federal court ruling that most of President Trump's global tariffs were illegal, raising uncertainty over trade policy and the fiscal impact of potential refunds. Rising Treasury yields added to the pressure, with the 10-year climbing above 4.2% and the 30-year
